section.title: Description
section.p: "A word or term by which a person or thing is commonly and distinctively known." - Collins English Dictionary. This datatype represents a organization's name.

stentry.p: "A word or term by which a person or thing is commonly and distinctively known." - Collins English Dictionary. This property represents a organization's name. Note that the datatype is simply a string, unlike HL7 V3's complex collection of name parts.
